!Vice Hierarch Eindburgh: I thought so. Since the Seeds of Chaos contain order out of chaos, only one child in a generation is born with the power. It is similar to a Magic Sword or Blood Sword... But now, with the expansion of our race's power and its spread throughout the continent, that power may likewise be spreading.
